sub_title: Executive Creative Director at Pico EMEA
summary:
With decades of experience as an award-winning creative leader, including 20+ years specializing in digital , I have worked in 6 different countries developing innovative campaigns for some of the world's leading brands at agencies such as Ogilvy, Havas, DDB and Wunderman (my most recent role leading creative teams across Greater China and beyond).

I have been a judge at Cannes Cyber Lions, ADMA, AdStars in Korea, China’s ROI Festival, Tencent Mind Awards, One Show China Festival and the Roca Design Challenge HK. As a regular speaker at events, I have presented at the American Chamber of Commerce Shanghai, Jiaotong University, Hong Kong University of Science & Technology and Metathink Brand Seminar.

Specialties: 10+ years art director and copywriter in sales promotion & direct marketing. 20 years focused on Digital Creative Direction and innovation. In my last 3 years in China I led teams across multiple locations as an Integrated ECD and was named as one of Campaign Asia's Digital A-List.

Moving to Hong Kong in early 2016, I co-founded creative consultancy We Are Open. Working with the local startup community, I regularly hosted MADLAB sessions to workshop marketing solutions. I have written and self-published three professional books:

The UX of ME: Career Optimization Through Design Thinking

The Axis of Success: Where Business Strategy & Creativity Collide. 

Autocreativity: How to make your mark in a cookie cutter world.

Visit my author profile page on Amazon: https://www.amazon.com/author/misterjones

Writing under the pseudonym Christopher Hart, I published a series of science fiction short stories exploring how the world will change thanks to artificial intelligence. Find out more here www.outmode.info

Going by the name CJAY, I also follow my passion for photography through my online gallery/store https://cjay-art.picfair.com

profile_positions.description:
My second book, The Axis of Success: Where Business Strategy & Creativity Collide, is a short is a manifesto for thinking differently. It’s about having a 360-degree vision of your business and being able to pivot effortlessly between strategic and creative ways of thinking. This new mindset takes elements of theoretical physics, the history of the Roman Empire, big business, a little mysticism and lots of creativity to take more control of the forces that impact success.

Startups and small businesses face a massive challenge. With so many critical factors it’s hard to get the upper hand. In this short book, learn how having the right culture influences all aspects of your business and see the power of being a purpose-driven company. Discover ways to turn employee passion into the fuel for your growth. See how big corporations turn positive reputation into dollars and maximize customer satisfaction through a holistic approach to business operations.

Above all, find out how harnessing the imagination in every single aspect of business can help you visualize and strategize new pathways to achieve your ambitions.
profile_positions.title: Author

profile_positions.description:
The UX of Me: Optimising your Career Through Design Thinking is my first foray into publishing. It is a new method that takes ideas from design thinking and brand strategy to not only help everyone become more valuable as employees or more admired as colleagues, but to have a career that is more purposeful. It will help you take control of the way others experience you as a colleague, a boss, a subordinate or collaborator. Above all, it will allow you to think more deeply about what you really want from your career then how to set and achieve your goals. It will help you know what you want, why it’s important and how to get there. 

Beyond the book itself, The UX of ME is a workshop and individual coaching. For more information visit the website www.theuxofme.com or go straight to the book in the Amazon Kindle store (you may need to switch to your own country) - https://amzn.com/B01LBVGF1Y

profile_positions.description:
We Are Open (WAO) was a Hong Kong based creative consultancy. Collaborative, media-neutral and unconstrained by traditional agency thinking. 

WAO’s philosophy of “open-source creativity” reflects the modern reality that brand’s face as they try to stay relevant for a constantly evolving, socially-empowered audience.

Constantly shifting, evolving and morphing, We Are Open creates inspiring digital experiences, compelling content and innovative ways to connect brands with customers.
